verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is a road inside of you. Inside of me there is one, too. No stumbling pilgrim in the dark The road to Zion’s in your heart. The road to Zion’s in your heart.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He’s shown the way with sun and shield, His grace and glory’s been revealed. Not one good thing will He withhold From those who walk and bear His load.{/lang-eng}
